      • initHrmax

        public void initHrmax(int age,
             boolean gender)
        Calculate the maximum heart rate with various algorithms discussed based on age and gender
        Parameters:
        age - The age of the user
        gender - The gender of the user (true == boy/false == girl)

      • heartAnom

        public int heartAnom(int bpm,
            boolean exercise)
        The main algorithm for detecting arrythmia for exercise/resting brachycardia/tachycardia
        Parameters:
        bpm - Beats per Minute!!
        exercise - True if the user is exercising, and false if the user is resting
        Returns:
        Returns an integer for the different possible outcomes 0 = No Anomaly, 1 = Exercise Tachycardia, 2 = Exercise Brachycardia, 3 = Resting Tachycardia, 4 = Resting Brachycardia

      • getHR

        public int getHR()
        Method to get user's heart rate
        Returns:
        Returns the user's heart rate (From Fitbit)
